desc: St. Louis's cheese and charcuterie boards for corporate catering, weddings, events, gifts and all other entertaining needs. Easy, yet sophisticated food for entertaining. Locally-owned and seasonally sourced ingredients. Vegan, and gluten free options, as well as brie cakes. Follow Thyme and Tables blog on our website.

layout.text: Blending delectable food and beautiful floral, to help make your special occasion memorable, delicious and stress free.
